misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Helsingin Golfklubi.  A regular competitor in the prestigious Hector Trophée, Olli has consistently demonstrated skill and determination on the course, participating in the event since 2022.

While Olli has yet to claim victory in the Hector Trophée, his consistent participation speaks volumes about his dedication to the game.  He's a formidable opponent, and his impressive performances year after year make him a player to watch.  Few players dare to give Olli lip, not just due to his intimidating presence on the course, but also because of his lesser-known, yet impressive, wrestling skills.

Beyond his golfing prowess, Olli also enjoys a successful career as a professional model.  This unique balance of athleticism and artistic expression highlights his multifaceted nature and serves as a testament to his diverse talents.  Olli's participation in the Hector Trophée is eagerly anticipated each year, and fans are excited to see what he'll bring to the tournament in the years to come.
